announcements.title: Welcome to Spring Semester 2026!
announcements.content: Classes begin on January 6th. Make sure to check your schedule and prepare for an exciting semester ahead!
announcements.author: Academic Office

announcements.title: Library Extended Hours
announcements.content: The university library will have extended hours (7 AM - 12 AM) during the exam period from January 15-25.
announcements.author: Library Services
